## vstack() function

Create a vertical stack layout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function vstack(...children: ViewNode[]): LayoutNode;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

children


</td><td>

[ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

View nodes to stack vertically


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[LayoutNode](./dsl.layoutnode.md)

A new [LayoutNode](./dsl.layoutnode.md) with vertical stacking

## Remarks

Arranges child views vertically with newlines between them. Children are rendered in order from top to bottom.

## Example


```typescript
vstack(
  text('Line 1'),
  text('Line 2'),
  text('Line 3')
)
```
